gcci.text: The $3.24/hr H100 pricing reflects persistent supply chain constraints driving capex inflation as data centers prioritize GPU procurement over traditional infrastructure investments.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's $1.47/1M token pricing signals intensifying API price wars, with efficiency gains from smaller models pressuring established players to optimize cost structures.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual load indicates grid strain from AI workloads, potentially accelerating nuclear power adoption as grids struggle to meet carbon-neutral targets.

aipi.text: Despite robust growth, the sector faces bubble risks as capex commitments outpace sustainable monetization, with infrastructure investments potentially outpacing real demand.
